abstract: mark hamill returns as trumpster to read global warming tweet in joker 's voice .
article: star wars : the last jedi star mark hamill rung in the new year with a new `` trumpster '' tweet , accompanied by an audio recording of hamill reading aloud a tweet made by president donald trump in the star 's joker voice . fancy a #torturedtrumpstertweet for a #hoaxynewjeer2018 ? enjoy paying trillions of dollars for #perpetualwar & #brandnewwaterfrontproperties ! ð ¨ ï ¸ ð '' ¥ â ˜ ï ¸ ð ¤ ª #maralagounderthesea pic . twitter . com/lnyo1ajtvuâ € '' @hamillhimself january 1 , 2018 `` fancy a #torturedtrumpstertweet for a #hoaxynewjeer2018 ? '' hamill wrote in the tweet , published at midnight january 1 .

`` enjoy paying trillions of dollars for #perpetualwar & #brandnewwaterfrontproperties ! `` hamill included the hashtags '' #weatherclimatesamesame '' and '' #maralagounderthesea , '' and attached a link to his `` hoaxy new jeers '' impression . hamill 's take on the infamous december 28 tweet , where the president confused weather and climate , can be heard above . in the east , it could be the coldest new yearâ € ™ s eve on record . perhaps we could use a little bit of that good old global warming that our country , but not other countries , was going to pay trillions of dollars to protect against .

bundle up ! â € '' donald j. trump december 29 , 2017 `` in the east , it could be the coldest new year 's eve on record , '' president trump wrote . `` perhaps we could use a little bit of that good old global warming that our country , but not other countries , was going to pay trillions of dollars to protect against . bundle up ! `` hamill , who voiced batman 's archfoe in batman : the animated series and the popular batman : arkham video game franchise , has been reading trump tweets as the joker since last year .

the actor previously endorsed and joined a gofundme campaign launched to purchase twitter and ban trump from the social media service . hamill recently engaged in twitter fisticuffs with republican senator ted cruz over the issue of net neutrality . star wars : the last jedi is now playing . star wars : the last jedi2017comicbook composite 82.78all-time comic movies nayour ratingstarstarstarstarstarall-time rated naaverage rating3 .19 / 5 from 160 users .
